description: Ms. codex. Title from title page (fol. 1a) Physical description: 24 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. European paper with watermark (Tre Lune). One senion. Inscription in Arabic numerals in red pencil on fol. 1a: "304". Origin: According to colophon, Text 1 copied by ʻAlī ...? ibn al-marḥūm Shihāb al-Dīn(?) al-muwaqqit bi-Jāmiʻ Naṣr Allāh, Tuesday 12 Jumādá al-Ākhar 1072 [Feb. 2, 1662] (fol. 4b) ; text 2 copied by the same, al-muwaqqit bi-...?, 24 Jumādá II 1072 [Feb. 14, 1662] (fol. 10a). Copyist: ʻAlī ibn Shihāb al-Dīn.
author: Sulamī, ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻAbd al-Salām, approximately 1182-1262
abstract: Collection of three short treatises on various topics.
contents: 1. fol. 1a-41 : Munyat al-sūl fī tafḍīl al-Rasūl / ʻIzz al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻAbd al-Salām al-Sulamī. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, no. 4511.
2. fol. 5a-10a : al-Qurab fī maḥabbat al-ʻArab / [ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn] al-ʻIrāqī. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, no. 682.
3. fol. 10b-12b: al-Qawāʻid wa-al-ḍawābiṭ fī uṣūl al-fiqh / Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, no. 885.

title.@value: كتاب منية السول في تفضيل الرسول / ويليه كتاب القرب في مهبة العرب للشيخ الامام العالم العلامة ولي الدين العراقي ... وفيه رسالة جليلة مشتملة على قواعد وضوابط واصول مهمات ومقاصد مطلوبات تحتاج اليه طالب علم الفقه مطلقا ولا يستغني عنها الا المقصرون للشيخ الامام العالم العلامة الهمام ولي الله تعالى ... ابو زكريا محيي الدين النواوي رضي الله عنه ...

Kitāb Munyat al-sūl fī tafḍīl al-Rasūl / wa-yalīhi Kitāb al-Qurab fī mahabbat al-ʻArab lil-Shaykh al-imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Walī al-Dīn al-ʻIrāqī ... wa-fīhi risālah jalīlah mushtamilah ʻalá qawāʻid wa-ḍawābiṭ wa-uṣūl muhimmāt wa-maqāṣid maṭlūbāt taḥtāj ilayhi ṭālib ʻilm al-fiqh muṭlaqan wa-lā yastaghnī ʻanhā illā al-muqaṣṣirūn lil-Shaykh al-imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-humām walī Allāh taʻālá ... Abū Zakaryā Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawāwī raḍiya Allāhu ʻanhu ...

provenance: Ownership statement in the name of Muḥammad ḤFnī al-Mahdī al-Shāfiʻī al-Miṣrī al-Azharī, 1320 H. [1902] on fol. 1a and 5a. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Sulamī, ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻAbd al-Salām, approximately 1182-1262
سلمي، عز الدين عبد العزيز بن عبد السلام
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, d. 632—Biography—History—13th century—Sources
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
